name: Mini Star Wars
description:
A mini-game made with Unity.

How to play:

  • Press the left and right arrow keys to move R2-D2 left and right. 
  • Use the space key to shoot stars that will eliminate Darth Vader.
  • Players die when Darth Vader reaches the R2-D2. 
  • New Darth Vaders will keep on being generated until your score reaches 10. You get one point for successfully eliminating 1 Darth Vader.
